Pre-Game Insights: Detroit ranks fourth in the Eastern Conference with 11.1 offensive rebounds per game led by Jalen Duren averaging 3.0.
The Pistons average 13.5 made 3-pointers per game this season, 2.1 more made shots on average than the 11.4 per game the Magic give up.

The Magic are 16-9 against conference opponents.
The Magic are 7-12 against opponents with a winning record.
The Pistons average 105.9 points per game, 9.3 fewer points than the 115.2 the Pistons give up to opponents.
Cade Cunningham is shooting 44.7% and averaging 24.0 points for the Pistons.
Goga Bitadze is shooting 65.6% and averaging 9.9 points for the Magic.
The Pistons have averaged 117.5 points, 40.9 rebounds, 27.1 assists, 9.3 steals and 4.2 blocks per game while shooting 47.9% from the field in their last 10 games.
The Magic have averaged 101.2 points, 40.7 rebounds, 22.0 assists, 8.6 steals and 6.2 blocks per game while shooting 44.0% from the field in their last 10 games.
